extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Method to create Players and ask for computer difficulty.
        Specified by:
        startGame in interface Game

      • addPlayers

        private void addPlayers(java.lang.String pName)
        Method to create Players by asking for names and difficulty.
        Parameters:
        pName - - the Human player's name

      • createCard

        private void createCard(int genre)
        Method to create Cards and assign them to decks. Takes the chosen genre of card and uses for loop to iterate through the deck and assign cards evenly among the two players.
        Parameters:
        genre - - The genre of cards to play the game with.

      • playRound

        private void playRound(int roundNum)
        Method containing game procedure. Makes calls to printCard(), and compare(Card, Card, int), compare() methods.
        Parameters:
        roundNum - - the round number for this turn of play

      • printCard

        private void printCard(Card hCard)
        Method to print Player Card Details to Screen using the getAttr() method.
        Parameters:
        hCard - - the current card in the Human player's hand

      • compare

        private void compare(Card hCard,
                     Card cCard,
                     int choice)
        Method to compare cards and reassign to winner's deck. Obtains values for each card by getAttr() and methods
        Parameters:
        hCard - - the current card in the Human player's hand
        cCard - - the current card in the Computer player's hand
        choice - - the choice of attribute made by whose turn it is

      • wait

        private static void wait(int millis)
        Method to delay terminal output. Utilises the sleep method
        Parameters:
        millis - - the number of milliseconds to wait execution by
